about.title: MARLIN
about.subtitle: Maritime Live Information
about.description: Real-time weather and marine condition data from various marinas
about.projectDescription: MARLIN is an innovative master's project for capturing and visualizing marine and weather data. Our sensor networks in various marinas continuously collect data that is made accessible through this platform.
about.teamDescription: Students of Master Applied Computer Science, who together develop the MARLIN project

features.interactiveMapDesc: Visualization of all sensors with real-time data and interpolated values between measurement points.
features.dashboardDesc: Detailed analysis of individual sensors with time series and historical trends.
features.apiDesc: RESTful API for programmatic access to all measurement data.

daniel.description: Coordinates the team and monitors project progress. Responsible for planning and organization.

fatih.description: Develops the user interface and mobile application. Specialized in React Native and modern UI/UX.

julian.description: Develops the map view and frontend components. Specialized in React Native and visualization.

krister.description: Develops backend services and analyzes sensor data. Expertise in API development and data processing.

tarek.description: Develops backend systems and manages infrastructure. Expertise in cloud technologies and CI/CD.
